title: Plugins
text: plugins arguments, corresponding reactive passed plugin: rctv_strMetricID (shiny::reactiveVal() connected “Metric” input) rctv_strSiteID (shiny::reactiveVal() connected “Site” input) rctv_strSubjectID (shiny::reactiveVal() connected “Participant” input) rctv_strDomainID (shiny::reactiveVal() connected “Domain” input) rctv_dfDOMAIN (eg rctv_dfAE, one domain defined ) input-connected reactiveVal()s, setting value pass value back main app. example, set Participant drop-menu subject “0008”, call rctv_strSubjectID("0008") inside plugin. recommend avoiding setting values NULL inside app, avoid issues synchronization.

what: Launching an App with a Plugin
title: Plugins
text: Use plugin_Read(strPath) read plugin definition prepare use app. Supply list one plugin definitions run_gsm_app() function lPlugins argument. example, code launches app sample Participant Profile plugin: Note subjPlugin must supplied inside enclosing list(), allow multiple plugin definitions.
code: subjPlugin <- plugin_Read(   system.file("plugins", "ParticipantProfile", package = "gsm.app") ) run_gsm_app(   dfAnalyticsInput = gsm.app::sample_dfAnalyticsInput,   dfBounds = gsm.app::sample_dfBounds,   dfGroups = gsm.app::sample_dfGroups,   dfMetrics = gsm.app::sample_dfMetrics,   dfResults = gsm.app::sample_dfResults,   fnFetchData = sample_fnFetchData,   lPlugins = list(subjPlugin) )

title: Define a plugin — plugin_Define
text: strName length-1 character name plugin, display user menu tabs plugins. chrDomains character Names data domains used plugin. Supported values: "AE" (Adverse Events), "DATACHG" (Data Changes), "DATAENT" (Data Entry), "ENROLL" (Enrollment), "LB" (Lab), "PD" (Protocol Deviations), "QUERY" (Queries), "STUDCOMP" (Study Completion), "SUBJ" (Subject Metadata), "SDRGCOMP" (Treatment Completion). fnShinyUI function character shiny module UI function plugin, name function current session. fnShinyServer function character shiny module server function plugin, name function current session. ... dots future extensions must empty. chrRequiredInputs character optional vector inputs ("Metric", "Site", "Participant", "Domain") must non-empty value plugin can load. "None" "" count "empty" check. user set value input, app display placeholder instructing user make selection. lConfig list Optional additional arguments pass fnShinyUI fnShinyServer. envCall environment environment function called, use better error messages. value usually left default, passed calling function calling function also envCall argument.

title: Define a plugin — plugin_Define

title: gsm.app 2.4.0
text: continue evolve app layout toward better usability!

title: gsm.app 2.4.0
text: “Site” “Participant” inputs now displayed top bar app, since used throughout app. Tab-specific filters remain sidebar, collapsed default (#400, #418). continue evolve layout user feedback. package updated use {gsm.core} {gsm.kri}, rather monolithic {gsm} (#412). {gsm.ae} plugin split package (site | demo app). split helps us identify tools help future plugin development, makes easier evolve main app AE plugin independently (#325). show title study top bar default, well name browser tab (#382).

title: gsm.app 2.4.0
text: Users can zoom tables “Domain Details” fill screen (#399), text fields now wrap make text easier read (#404). internal UI functions now available use plugins (#402), plugin-definition process streamlined new plugin_Define() function (#407), better documentation plugin_Read() (#406). Users flexibility domains include app, refer (#415). interface continue evolve better support plugins.

title: gsm.app 2.3.0
text: Apps now feature site-level domain details!

title: gsm.app 2.3.0
text: new “Domain Details” tab shows domain data whatever level selected via inputs – study-level, site-level, participant-level (#245, #353, #374). former “Participant Details” formed core new “Participant Profile” plugin. expand refine plugin via user feedback (#342, #328). Communication plugins now bidirectional! Plugin authors can set inputs “Site” “Participant”, inputs push back app tabs plugins (#329).

title: gsm.app 2.3.0
text: Domain data now fetched app level passed tabs plugins, minimizing computation time (#345). “Domain” now top-level input, domains selected “Domain Details” tab can passed plugins, domains selected inside plugins can passed back “Domain Details” tab (#361). Errors generated function fetches data passed users app. allows deployment team pass information users correct issues, selecting site participant, avoiding particular site participant (#355). “Time Series” plot “Metric Details” tab now supports longitudinial data. one snapshot provided app, additional snapshots displayed (#386, #390).

title: gsm.app 2.2.0
text: Introducing Plugins! Plugins allow users extend apps produced {gsm.app} additional functionality specific domains combinations domains.

title: gsm.app 2.2.0
text: now support plugins! See new “Plugins” vignette details create plugin. demo Adverse Events plugin provided part {gsm.app} installation (#319, #322, #323, #324). Domain data can now fetched site study level. data currently used plugins, also allow refinement main app going forward (#321).

title: gsm.app 2.2.0
text: Numeric participant-domain data now automatically rounds appropriate number significant digits (#313). inputs now implemented full Shiny module inputs. end result various charts update smoothly response changes elsewhere app (#309, #310). new argument chrDomains can now provided launch limit domains app expects (#333). KRIs 0 flags longer break “Analysis Output” table “Metric Details” tab (#339). variable names standardized (#331).

title: gsm.app 2.1.0
text: version focuses stability, well integration {gsm} 2.1.2:

title: gsm.app 2.1.0
text: Add optional arguments allow users customize UI /server resulting Shiny app. allow users add logging functionality, example (#283). tables standardized use {gt} package. adds sorting resizing functionality columns, fixes several bugs (#187, #208, #224, #248, #289, #294). sample data now contains KRIs, demonstrate fully functional app (#207). Overview Table Study Overview tab now interactive. Click site /KRI view details KRI site. filters table can also updated clicking red/amber pills top Overview Table tab (#196, #243, #244, #264).

title: gsm.app 2.1.0
text: Code separated easier--manage subfunctions (#286). sidebar now uses Report_Studyinfo() {gsm}, rather custom app. table collapsible/expandable show subset information vs available information study (#288).

title: gsm.app 2.0.0
text: complete rewrite package use {gsm} 2.0+.

title: gsm.app 2.0.0
text: sidebar (overall study information drop-menus) can collapsed focus drill-modules. Charts tables can expanded fill browser window. Participant details now loading animations make clearer data processing.

title: gsm.app 2.0.0
text: Renamed package {gsm.app} consistency related apps. Apps produced version package load much faster produced previous version. Numerous improvements made --hood improve stability maintainability. 100% code covered tests.

title: gsm.app 1.0.0
text: first major release {gsmApp}! 🥳

title: gsm.app 1.0.0
text: Adds faceted scatter plot view easy comparison site across assessments. New approach using sample data, using qs. allows app deployed shinyapps.io. columns now available view/inspection given domain. UI modified better user experience.

title: gsm.app 1.0.0
text: Fixed bug sample data erroneously used {gsm} v1.9.2 instead current dev branch, includes fixes htmlwidgets allowing interaction Shiny app.

title: gsm.app 0.6.0
text: release planned pre-v1.0.0 release includes significant changes UI, well changes allow app used experimentally live study data.

title: gsm.app 0.6.0
text: Adds site participant metadata improved drill-functionality. charts linked side-panel, site selected, metadata presented selected site across tabs. UI modified based user feedback provide better experience navigating app.

title: gsm.app 0.6.0
text: Namespacing documentation updated consistent R packages apps ecosystem.
